Variable.Name: Device_Available_Int
Variable.Comment: NOTE: in 1tool, Device_Available is modified also if it is declared as VAR_IN. This is allowed also if not standard. To do this in c.suite, we copy at first that variable inside this one, the use this one in the code.

Variable.Name: Device_Available_Int
Variable.Comment: NOTE: in 1tool, Device_Available is modified also if it is declared as VAR_IN. This is allowed also if not standard. To do this in c.suite, we copy at first that variable inside this one, the use this one in the code.

Variable.Name: Delta_Power_Inc
Variable.Comment: Used ton calcolate the power increase when you turn on one o two compressor

Variable.Name: Delta_Power_Dec
Variable.Comment: Used ton calcolate the power decrease when you turn on one o two compressor

Variable.Name: PwrReq
Variable.Comment: Power request

Variable.Name: CfgStage
Variable.Comment: Array with the number of load steps for each device

Variable.Name: DevPwr
Variable.Comment: Array with devices power in Kw

Variable.Name: DevAvbl_Array
Variable.Comment: Array of devices feedbacks

Variable.Name: TWork
Variable.Comment: Array with the device operating hours

Variable.Name: CstRotOn
Variable.Comment: Array for custom rotation, specify start order

Variable.Name: CstRotOff
Variable.Comment: Array for custom rotation, specify shutdown order

Variable.Name: CntDwnSafT_Array
Variable.Comment: Array containing countdowns of safety times for each device

Variable.Name: CntDwnFrcOnT
Variable.Comment: Array containing countdowns of minimum on time for each device

Variable.Name: PreventCirc
Variable.Comment: Array of preventing situation management for each circuit

Variable.Name: FrcRot
Variable.Comment: Array of devices rotation forcing per circuit (0=disabled, 1=enabled)

Variable.Name: FrcOnDevCirc
Variable.Comment: Array of on forcing per circuit (0=disabled, 1=enabled)

Variable.Name: Conf
Variable.Comment: Function block configuration

Variable.Name: WaitOtherDev
Variable.Comment: Awaiting second module device (dual line management)

Variable.Name: En_DevicesRotation
Variable.Comment: Enables the function block

Variable.Name: DevRot
Variable.Comment: Array of requests to each device (on/off/number of steps required)

Variable.Name: DevStatus
Variable.Comment: Array of actual devices status

Variable.Name: DevPwrOut
Variable.Comment: Array of currently used power for each device

Variable.Name: DevPwrOutPerc
Variable.Comment: Array of currently used power for each device in percentual

Variable.Name: ModulPwrReq
Variable.Comment: Power request for the inverter (if present)

Variable.Name: DevNextOn
Variable.Comment: Index of next devices to be switched on

Variable.Name: CircNextOn
Variable.Comment: Index of next circuit to be switched on

Variable.Name: DevNextOff
Variable.Comment: Index of next devices to be switched off

Variable.Name: CircNextOff
Variable.Comment: Index of next circuit to be switched off

Variable.Name: StepsRequired
Variable.Comment: Current number of steps required to meet power request

Variable.Name: StepsNo
Variable.Comment: Total number of steps

Variable.Name: LdUpCntDwn
Variable.Comment: Countdown for next step increase

Variable.Name: LdDwnCntDwn
Variable.Comment: Countdown for next step decrease

Variable.Name: PreventResult
Variable.Comment: Result of prevent function

Variable.Name: StopOtherDev
Variable.Comment: Stops devices in applications with a second line (dual line management)

Variable.Name: ErrorBox
Variable.Comment: Errors buffer

Variable.Name: DevPwrOut_INT
Variable.Comment: Array of currently used power for each device

Variable.Name: DevPwr_INT
Variable.Comment: Array with devices power in Kw
